title: LG Black Diamond 4-Door French Door Bottom Freezer Refrigerator LMXC23746D - Overview
description:
LG Black Diamond 4-Door French Door Bottom Freezer Refrigerator - LMXC23746D
http://www.abt.com/product/90910/LG-LMXC23746D.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=LMXC23746BD_20160205

With a generous 22.7 cu. ft. capacity this 4 Door Refrigerator with CustomChill™ drawer gives you the freedom to stock up on groceries in 1 trip. Thanks to the versatile CustomChill™ drawer you have additional refrigerator or soft freezer space when you need it. Plus our advanced Smart Cooling System is designed to maintain superior humidity and temperature levels to help keep food fresher longer while the Fresh Air Filter helps keep food tasting its best.
Features:
Style and Design
• 22.7 Cu. Ft. Capacity
• Slim SpacePlus Ice System
• Premium Stainless Steel Finish
• Contoured Doors with Matching Commercial Handles
• SmartPull™ Freezer Handle
• Hidden Hinges
• Premium LED Interior Light
Organization
• CustomChill™ Drawer
• EasyReach™ Bins
• 3 SpillProtector™ Tempered Glass Shelves / 1 Folding Shelf
• 2 Humidity Crispers/1 Bonus Drawer
• 3-Tier Organization™ Freezer
• 6 Door Bins
• DuraBase™ Solid Drawer Base
• Glide N Serve™ Drawer
• Glide N Access™ Shelf
Performance
• Smart Cooling Plus System
• Fresh Air Filter
• Dual Evaporators
• Linear Compressor for Better Energy Quiet Operation and Durability
• Multi-Air Flow
• Electronic Temperature Controls
• Tall Ice & Water Dispenser
• IcePlus™ Accelerated Freezing Function
• Premium Water Filtration System
• SmartDiagnosis™ System
• Door Alarm
• LoDecibel™ Quiet Operation
